column3: This cotton jersey tank features our screen-printed signature pony. Ribbed scoop neckline. Sleeveless silhouette. Even-sewn hem. Our screen-printed signature pony accents the upper back. 100% cotton. Hand wash. Imported.
column4:
The Pink Pony Campaign is Ralph Lauren Corporation's worldwide initiative in the fight against cancer, supporting programs for screening, early diagnosis, treatment, research and patient navigation.
Our mission is to reduce disparities in cancer care in medically underserved communities and ensure that treatment is available at an earlier, more curable stage.
Globally, 25% of the purchase price of Pink Pony products is directed to an international network of charities.
To learn more, please visit RalphLauren.com/PinkPony.
